name: cc-tstl-template
description: Template project for ComputerCraft programs written in TypeScript.

scripts.gist: yarn build && gh gist edit bd833e111508f54af5560d3974ec8e63 main.lua && echo wget run https://gist.githubusercontent.com/Promises/bd833e111508f54af5560d3974ec8e63/raw/main.lua?t=$(date +%H%M%S) | pbcopy
